answers.answer: my younger sister had a partial molar pregnancy.  i know that she had to go in for a lot of bloodwork.  she was already 4months when the dr. discovered it.  she had a d&c and was told to wait at least a year to ttc because if she became pregnant the cells could grow back and cause her to lose the baby.  the dr. also told her they treated the preg. as a type of cancer.  they did u/s to check to make sure the cells didn't grow back.  it also took quite a bit of time (i think about 7 months)for her hcg levels to go down.  then, about 1 yr after the molar preg she went in for testing because she wasn't having regular af, and guess what.  she was preg.  my niece just turned 2 sept. 11th and is great.  my sister had preeclampsia during the preg, but that had nothing to do with the molar preg.  other than that all was well.  good luck.

I had a complete molar pregnancy. I had to have an xray. Nothing was found. I had to wait a year after the hcg went back to 0. For a partial they make you wait 6 months usually. It took my hcg almost 6 months to go back to 0 so I had to wait 18 months before I could get preg. I have had 5 healthy babies since the molar.
i have just had dnc after 2nd partial molar pregnancy...and nobody has told e anything about a chest xray!!!

I just had the results from the pathology that they did after my dnc and the results came back as partial mole.  The thing that scared me the most is that they said I had to go see an oncologyst( the word is the scariest ever)  This is just a day before my 28th B-day! However the thing is tha tmy hcg level is already down to 12 ( I had my dnc done about 2 weeks ago).  I am scared 1st because this is my second pregnancy and the only one that I had problems with since the bagining( I have a 2 year old and with that pregnancy I had no problems whatsoever). 2nd because they told me that I may need either chemo or radiation depending on what the Dr. says. 3rd I don't even want to think what would my little girl do without her mom.  Any advice will be appreciated.

question: Has anyone had a partial molar pregnancy? How long do you have to wait to conceive again? Did anyone have to have a chest xray? Was anything bad found? Any information would be helpful. Thanks.
title: PARTIAL MOLAR PREGNANCY
